attributes.action: pay disability, attendance and carers allowance as has been directed by the courts now!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Old disabled people who have paid into the UK system all there lives have had attendance, disability and carers allowance stopped just because they have moved to another country within the EU.
If they have paid in why should there address effect these allowances? The courts say the payments should be made.
MAKE THESE PAYMENTS NOW stop trying to default. My mother is 92 years old and has been crippled by MRSA from Warwick Hospital and has had her allowances stopped although assurances that they would not was given. It shames the UK my mother paid in all her life working until she was 70. My dad did too, a war hero.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
